content.rendered:
Careers

Our employees are the heart of NEBS, and service is our business.

Join Our Team

When you join our team, you become a part of representing the culture to the community. We take great pride in helping our customers grow their businesses and supporting our employees to achieve their highest potential as a part of our family. Click the link below to view our open positions.

Download Application

Benefits

  • Health, Dental, and Vision Plans
  • Ancillary Plans (Life, AD&D, Accident, etc.)
  • Short Term and Long Term Disability
  • Paid Time Off and Paid Holidays
  • 401K Plan including Company Match

  • Lumber Yard Associate

    Load customer orders, unload incoming inventory, assist in inventory control and perform general housekeeping. Must have forklift experience.

    Learn more
